title: Number of Carnival Corporation & plc passengers worldwide 2007 to 2019
summary: Overall Number of passengers in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of passengers in millions is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2018, and finally roughly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Number of passengers in millions, about 12.9 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Number of passengers in millions, of value 10.06 was reported at Year 2013
min_summary: In general Number of passengers in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of passengers in millions is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2018, and finally roughly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
